Package com.deco2800.game.components.tasks.thor

Class ThorAnimationController

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.components.Component
com.deco2800.game.components.tasks.thor.ThorAnimationController
public class ThorAnimationController
extends Component
This class listens to events relevant to an entity's state and plays the animation when one of the events is triggered.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class com.deco2800.game.components.Component

    enabled, entity

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ThorAnimationController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void animateAttackDown()
    Animates the entity to attack in the down direction, this will prevent animations from overriding for the duration of the attack animation.
    void animateAttackLeft()
    Animates the entity to attack in the left direction, this will prevent animations from overriding for the duration of the attack animation.
    void animateAttackRight()
    Animates the entity to attack in the right direction, this will prevent animations from overriding for the duration of the attack animation.
    void animateAttackUp()
    Animates the entity to attack in the up direction, this will prevent animations from overriding for the duration of the attack animation.
    void animateDown()
    Animates the entity in the down direction, if the player is dead, then it will animate the death.
    void animateLeft()
    Animates the entity in the left direction, if the player is dead, then it will animate the death.
    void animateRight()
    Animates the entity in the right direction, if the player is dead, then it will animate the death.
    void animateUp()
    Animates the entity in the up direction, if the player is dead, then it will animate the death.
    void create()
    Create the animation add listener on entity with wander and chase task play animation on corresponding atlas
    void setDeath()
    Sets the death of the entity to be true.
    void stopDown()
    Play the animation for the entity when the entity is stationary and was previously moving down.
    void stopLeft()
    Play the animation for the entity when the entity is stationary and was previously moving left.
    void stopRight()
    Play the animation for the entity when the entity is stationary and was previously moving right.
    void stopUp()
    Play the animation for the entity when the entity is stationary and was previously moving up.

    dispose, earlyUpdate, getEntity, setEnabled, setEntity, toString, triggerEarlyUpdate, triggerUpdate, update
